summary: A utility class that aggregates and manages a suite of linear models for numerous lifestyle and demographic factors—such as urban‑rural status, wealth, exercise, tobacco and alcohol use, marital status, education, sanitation, water access, BMI, circumcision and sex‑work. It offers initialization, retrieval, prediction and update capabilities for each model and their transition probabilities, serving as a centralized repository for lifestyle‑related risk calculations.
business_intent: Support population health and risk‑assessment simulations by providing consistent, up‑to‑date linear representations of lifestyle attributes, enabling scenario analysis, policy evaluation and outcome forecasting based on changes in behavior and demographics.
